entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is the gamekeeper at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He made them tea and offered them stoat sandwiches.

entities.name: fluffy
entities.description: Fluffy is a three-headed dog that is guarding the Philosopher's Stone.

entities.name: philosopher’s stone
entities.description: The Philosopher's Stone is an object that is being guarded by Fluffy and possibly other unknown entities.

entities.name: gringotts
entities.description: Gringotts is a wizarding bank where the Philosopher's Stone was almost stolen.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the students who are asking Hagrid about the Philosopher's Stone.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is another student who is asking Hagrid about the Philosopher's Stone.

relationships.description: Hagrid knows that Fluffy and possibly other entities are guarding the Philosopher's Stone.
Fluffy is one of the entities that is guarding the Philosopher's Stone.
The Philosopher's Stone was almost stolen from Gringotts, a wizarding bank.
Harry is asking Hagrid about the Philosopher's Stone.
Hermione is using a flattering voice to ask Hagrid about the Philosopher's Stone.
